#include<iostream>
#include<cmath>
#include<algorithm>
using namespace std;
int main()
{
    unsigned long long catalan[1001];
    catalan[0] = catalan[1] = 1;
    for (int i=2; i<=1000; i++)
    {
        catalan[i] = 0;
        for (int j=0; j<i; j++)
            catalan[i] = (catalan[i]+(catalan[j] * catalan[i-j-1])%10000)%10000;
    }
    int t,n;
    cin>>t;
    while(t--)
    {
              cin>>n;
              if (n>0) cout<<catalan[n-1]<<endl;
              else cout<<"1\n";
    }
    return 0;
}
